title: Tiraz Embroidery, 11th century
medium:
Medium: linen, silk
Technique: embroidered on plain weave
description: Arabic inscription embroidered in red silk on a natural linen ground. Translation: Bismillah ir-Rahman – In the name of God the Merciful.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tiraz Embroidery, 11th century. Medium: linen, silk
Technique: embroidered on plain weave. 1972-81-40.
